issue.title: [Plasma] Fix plasma executable name in build for Java
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-7393](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7393). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
test.sh file to build plasma binaries for java has a critical error in a filepath

comments.body:
